rootpass.top.en:
Password request
Device unlock
Security: Low
Tip: a convenience PIN is OK.
rootpass.top.zh:
输入密码
解锁
安全含义:低

update.top.en:
Password request
Software update key
Security: Critical
Tip: use a phrase instead of a word.
update.top.zh:
输入密码
软件更新
安全含义:至关重要
update.top.en-audio: Enter update password. This password is critically important.

rootkeys.setup.en:
This will init the root keys.
I'm going to need two
passwords:
 1. Device unlock
 2. Software update
rootkeys.setup.zh:
这将初始化根密钥
需要两个密码
1.解锁
2.软件更新
rootkeys.setup.en-audio: This will initialize the root keys. We're going to need two passwords, one for device unlock, and one for software updates.

rootkeys.setup_wait.en:
Initializing keys. This may
take a couple minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.setup_wait.zh:
现在正在初始化
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.setup_wait.en-audio: Initializing keys. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.
